item.title: Mcollective agent to use drush
item.description: I have written a mcollective agent to run drush commands. It will help you to automate the deployments of your drupal websites. I have implemented two drush commands so far: cache-clear updatedb The full configuration is available on the github project. Examples Updatedb ::text mco rpc drush updatedb root=/var/vhost/frontend-demo yes=true Cache-clear ::text mco rpc drush cache-clear root=/var/vhost/frontend-demo uri=http://demo.example.net type=all Links mcollective drush the agent on github
